Package ohos.aafwk.ability.continuation

Provides interfaces and classes for interacting with the hop task management service for ability hopping.

You can register the ability to be hopped with the hop task management service, manage devices that support hopping through the hop task management service, provide a list of candidate devices for the user, and start hopping based on the selected device information.

Since:
5
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IContinuationDeviceCallback
    Provides callbacks for listening for device connection state changes.
    IContinuationRegisterManager
    Provides methods for interacting with the hop task management service, including methods for registering and unregistering the ability to hop, updating the device connection state, and showing the list of devices that can be selected for hopping.
    RequestCallback
    Provides a callback for listening for connection state changes of the hop task management service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContinuationDeviceInfo
    Defines the information about the device selected by the user.
    ExtraParams
    Defines the extra parameters used to sort out the list of available devices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceConnectState
    Enumerates the connection states of a device in the hop task management service.
